lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The administration official, who asked not to be named, told Reuters there had been commercial sales of products licensed by the Commerce Department, which maintains a list of products that can be exported without hurting national security.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: It said some shipments labelled "machine parts" had moved through Ostend, Belgium,on aircraft of the Santa Lucia Airways, which it identified as operated by the U.
